main.name: Joey Liu
main.description: I am a junior full stack data scientist and eager to solve data problems with pragmatic technologies
main.bio: I leverage big data to uncover in-depth consumer insights and create data-driven investment strategies. I have professional experience in Spark, SQL, Tableau, Airflow and Python. On the side, I built Web and IOS applications with tools like Django, ReactJS, Swift and cloud technologies like AWS and GCP.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
